name: studio apart(ment)
description:
made in 72 hours for the indie tales game jam

you just moved into a tiny studio apartment in a crowded city. yuck. the apartment costs a ton per month in rent but is still packed! now you have to go on with your life and complete daily tasks before each day is over. 

CONTROLS:

  • LEFT click on a tile to move to it
  • RIGHT click a workstation to complete its task
  • tasks which have dark text mean you cannot move while completing them
  • tasks which have white text let you move while completing them

TOOLS USED:

  • unity
  • krita
  • blender
  • soundtrap

it's a fairly short game but i had a lot of fun making it and i hope you have fun playing it!
